 358	 /**
 359	 * 绑定Swoole事件
 360	 *
 361	 * @return void
 362	 */
 363	 protected function bindEvents(): void
 364	 {
 365	 // 工作进程启动事件
 366	 $this->server->on('WorkerStart', [$this, 'onWorkerStart']);
 367	
 368	 // HTTP请求事件
 369	 $this->server->on('Request', [$this, 'onRequest']);
 370	
 371	 // 服务器启动事件
 372	 $this->server->on('Start', [$this, 'onStart']);
 373	
 374	 // 服务器关闭事件
 375	 $this->server->on('Shutdown', [$this, 'onShutdown']);
 376	
 377	 // Worker 错误事件
 378	 $this->server->on('WorkerError', [$this, 'onWorkerError']);
 379	
 380	 // Worker 退出事件
 381	 $this->server->on('WorkerExit', [$this, 'onWorkerExit']);
 382	
 383	 // WebSocket 事件
 384	 if ($this->isWebSocketEnabled()) {
 385	 $this->server->on('Open', [$this, 'onWebSocketOpen']);
 386	 $this->server->on('Message', [$this, 'onWebSocketMessage']);
 387	 $this->server->on('Close', [$this, 'onWebSocketClose']);
 388	 }
 389	
 390	 // 如果启用了Task进程，绑定Task事件
 391	 $config = array_merge($this->defaultConfig, $this->config);
 392	 if (isset($config['settings']['task_worker_num']) && $config['settings']['task_worker_num'] > 0) {
 393	 $this->server->on('Task', [$this, 'onTask']);
 394	 $this->server->on('Finish', [$this, 'onFinish']);
 395	 }

 398	 /**
 399	 * 工作进程启动事件处理
 400	 *
 401	 * @param Server $server Swoole服务器实例
 402	 * @param int $workerId 工作进程ID
 403	 * @return void
 404	 */
 405	 public function onWorkerStart(Server $server, int $workerId): void
 406	 {
 407	 try {
 408	 // 设置进程标题
 409	 if (function_exists('cli_set_process_title')) {
 410	 cli_set_process_title("swoole-worker-{$workerId}");
 411	 }
 412	
 413	 // 设置工作进程的执行时间限制和信号处理
 414	 set_time_limit(0);
 415	
 416	 // 禁用一些可能导致问题的信号处理
 417	 if (function_exists('pcntl_signal')) {
 418	 pcntl_signal(SIGALRM, SIG_IGN); // 忽略SIGALRM信号
 419	 pcntl_signal(SIGTERM, SIG_DFL); // 默认处理SIGTERM
 420	 pcntl_signal(SIGINT, SIG_DFL); // 默认处理SIGINT
 421	 }
 422	
 423	 // 判断是否为Task进程
 424	 $isTaskWorker = $workerId >= $server->setting['worker_num'];
 425	
 426	 if (!$isTaskWorker) {
 427	 // 只在HTTP Worker进程中初始化应用
 428	 if ($this->app && method_exists($this->app, 'initialize')) {
 429	 // 简化的初始化，避免耗时操作
 430	 try {
 431	 // 临时禁用错误报告，避免初始化过程中的警告影响进程
 432	 $oldErrorReporting = error_reporting(E_ERROR | E_PARSE);
 433	
 434	 $this->app->initialize();
 435	
 436	 // 恢复错误报告
 437	 error_reporting($oldErrorReporting);
 438	
 439	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
 440	 echo "Worker #{$workerId} app initialization failed: " . $e->getMessage() . "\n";
 441	 // 不抛出异常，让进程继续运行
 442	 }
 443	 }
 444	 echo "HTTP Worker #{$workerId} started\n";
 445	 } else {
 446	 echo "Task Worker #{$workerId} started\n";
 447	 }
 448	
 449	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
 450	 echo "Worker #{$workerId} start failed: " . $e->getMessage() . "\n";
 451	 // 不抛出异常，让进程继续运行
 452	 }
 453	 }

 455	 /**
 456	 * HTTP请求事件处理（改进版）
 457	 *
 458	 * @param SwooleRequest $request Swoole请求对象
 459	 * @param SwooleResponse $response Swoole响应对象
 460	 * @return void
 461	 */
 462	 public function onRequest(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): void
 463	 {
 464	 $startTime = microtime(true);
 465	
 466	 // 使用协程处理请求
 467	 go(function () use ($request, $response, $startTime) {
 468	 try {
 469	 // 设置协程上下文
 470	 $this->setCoroutineContext($request, $startTime);
 471	
 472	 // 运行中间件
 473	 if (!$this->runMiddlewares($request, $response)) {
 474	 return;
 475	 }
 476	
 477	 // 处理静态文件
 478	 if ($this->handleStaticFile($request, $response)) {
 479	 return;
 480	 }
 481	
 482	 // 处理动态请求
 483	 $psr7Request = $this->convertSwooleRequestToPsr7($request);
 484	 $psr7Response = $this->handleRequest($psr7Request);
 485	 $this->sendSwooleResponse($response, $psr7Response);
 486	
 487	 // 记录请求指标
 488	 $this->logRequestMetrics($request, $startTime);
 489	
 490	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
 491	 $this->handleSwooleError($response, $e);
 492	 } finally {
 493	 // 清理协程上下文
 494	 $this->clearCoroutineContext();
 495	 }
 496	 });
 497	 }

 596	 /**
 597	 * 将Swoole请求转换为PSR-7请求（优化版）
 598	 *
 599	 * @param SwooleRequest $request Swoole请求
 600	 * @return \Psr\Http\Message\ServerRequestInterface PSR-7请求
 601	 */
 602	 protected function convertSwooleRequestToPsr7(SwooleRequest $request): \Psr\Http\Message\ServerRequestInterface
 603	 {
 604	 // 使用复用的工厂实例
 605	 if (!$this->requestCreator) {
 606	 $this->requestCreator = new ServerRequestCreator(
 607	 $this->psr17Factory,
 608	 $this->psr17Factory,
 609	 $this->psr17Factory,
 610	 $this->psr17Factory
 611	 );
 612	 }
 613	
 614	 // 构建服务器变量
 615	 $server = array_merge($_SERVER, [
 616	 'REQUEST_METHOD' => $request->server['request_method'] ?? 'GET',
 617	 'REQUEST_URI' => $request->server['request_uri'] ?? '/',
 618	 'PATH_INFO' => $request->server['path_info'] ?? '/',
 619	 'QUERY_STRING' => $request->server['query_string'] ?? '',
 620	 'HTTP_HOST' => $request->header['host'] ?? 'localhost',
 621	 'CONTENT_TYPE' => $request->header['content-type'] ?? '',
 622	 'CONTENT_LENGTH' => $request->header['content-length'] ?? '',
 623	 ]);
 624	
 625	 return $this->requestCreator->fromArrays(
 626	 $server,
 627	 $request->header ?? [],
 628	 $request->cookie ?? [],
 629	 $request->get ?? [],
 630	 $request->post ?? [],
 631	 $request->files ?? [],
 632	 $request->rawContent() ?: null
 633	 );
 634	 }

 639	 * @param SwooleResponse $swooleResponse Swoole响应对象
 640	 * @param \Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface $psr7Response PSR-7响应对象
 641	 * @return void
 642	 */
 643	 protected function sendSwooleResponse(SwooleResponse $swooleResponse, \Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface $psr7Response): void
 644	 {
 645	 // 设置状态码
 646	 $swooleResponse->status($psr7Response->getStatusCode());
 647	
 648	 // 设置响应头

 654	 $swooleResponse->end((string) $psr7Response->getBody());

 725	 /**
 726	 * CORS 中间件
 727	 *
 728	 * @param SwooleRequest $request
 729	 * @param SwooleResponse $response
 730	 * @return bool
 731	 */
 732	 protected function corsMiddleware(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): bool
 733	 {
 734	 $config = array_merge($this->defaultConfig, $this->config);
 735	 $corsConfig = $config['middleware']['cors'];
 736	
 737	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', $corsConfig['allow_origin'] ?? '*');
 738	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', $corsConfig['allow_methods'] ?? 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
 739	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $corsConfig['allow_headers'] ?? 'Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');
 740	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Credentials', 'true');
 741	
 742	 // 处理 OPTIONS 预检请求
 743	 if ($request->server['request_method'] === 'OPTIONS') {
 744	 $response->status(200);
 745	 $response->end();
 746	 return false;
 747	 }
 748	
 749	 return true;

 768	 /**
 769	 * 处理静态文件
 770	 *
 771	 * @param SwooleRequest $request
 772	 * @param SwooleResponse $response
 773	 * @return bool
 774	 */
 775	 protected function handleStaticFile(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): bool
 776	 {
 777	 $config = array_merge($this->defaultConfig, $this->config);
 778	
 779	 if (!($config['static_file']['enable'] ?? true)) {
 780	 return false;
 781	 }
 782	
 783	 $uri = $request->server['request_uri'];
 784	 $publicPath = $this->getPublicPath();
 785	 $filePath = $publicPath . $uri;
 786	
 787	 // 检查文件是否存在且在允许的目录内
 788	 if (!$this->isValidStaticFile($filePath, $publicPath)) {
 789	 return false;
 790	 }
 791	
 792	 // 检查文件扩展名
 793	 $extension = strtolower(pathinfo($filePath, PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
 794	 if (!in_array($extension, $config['static_file']['allowed_extensions'])) {
 795	 return false;
 796	 }
 797	
 798	 // 设置 MIME 类型
 799	 $mimeType = $this->getMimeType($extension);
 800	 $response->header('Content-Type', $mimeType);
 801	
 802	 // 设置缓存头
 803	 $cacheTime = $config['static_file']['cache_time'];
 804	 $response->header('Cache-Control', "public, max-age={$cacheTime}");
 805	 $response->header('Last-Modified', gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', filemtime($filePath)) . ' GMT');
 806	
 807	 // 发送文件
 808	 $response->sendfile($filePath);
 809	 return true;
 810	 }

Bref Runtime
============

[](#bref-runtime)

Deploy an application with AWS Lambda using Bref.

We support all kinds of applications. See the following sections for details.

1. [Installation and usage](#installation)
2. [Symfony application](#symfony-application)
3. [Laravel application](#laravel-application)
4. [PSR-15 application](#psr-15-application)
5. [Console application](#console-application)
6. [PSR-11 container application](#psr-11-container)
 1. [Invoke handlers locally](#invoke-handlers-locally)
 2. [Simplify serverless.yml](#simplify-serverlessyml)
 3. [Typed handlers](#typed-handlers)
 4. [Symfony Messenger integration](#symfony-messenger-integration)

If you are new to the Symfony Runtime component, read more in the [main readme](https://github.com/php-runtime/runtime).

Installation
------------

[](#installation)

 composer require runtime/bref
 

To get started, we need a `serverless.yml` file in our projects root. We also use the `./vendor/runtime/bref-layer` plugin. Now we can tell AWS that we want to use a "layer" called `${runtime-bref:php-80}` to run our application on.

Next we need to define the environment variable `APP_RUNTIME` so the Runtime component knows what runtime to use.

# serverless.yml
service: my-app-name

plugins:
 - ./vendor/runtime/bref-layer # <----- Add the extra Serverless plugin

provider:
 name: aws
 region: eu-central-1
 runtime: provided.al2
 memorySize: 1792
 environment:
 APP\_ENV: prod
 APP\_RUNTIME: Runtime\\Bref\\Runtime
 BREF\_LOOP\_MAX: 100 # Optional

functions:
 website:
 handler: public/index.php
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 # Specify that we want HTTP requests
 - httpApi: '\*'

That is really it!

We use this file for all kinds of applications. The only thing we change in the `events`. Imagine that we want to listen to changes to S3 or new SQS messages. Or we could let this function to be invoked by another application in our system using a `Bref\Event\Handler`.

Symfony application
-------------------

[](#symfony-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

Use the standard Symfony 5.3+ `public/index.php`.

// public/index.php

use App\\Kernel;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 return new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);
};

There is nothing special you need to do.

Here is [an example application](https://github.com/Nyholm/bref-runtime-demo). With this runtime you may use the exact same application for in local development and in production.

Laravel application
-------------------

[](#laravel-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

To run a Laravel application, you need to update your front controller to look similar to this:

// public/index.php

use Illuminate\\Contracts\\Http\\Kernel;

define('LARAVEL\_START', microtime(true));

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (): Kernel {
 static $app;

 if (null === $app) {
 $app = require dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/bootstrap/app.php';
 }

 return $app\->make(Kernel::class);
};

Now you are up and running on AWS Lambda!

See [`runtime/laravel`](https://github.com/php-runtime/laravel) on how to run this locally.

PSR-15 application
------------------

[](#psr-15-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

Bref is using [`nyholm/psr7`](https://github.com/nyholm/psr7) to provide a PSR-7 and PSR-15 experience. See [`runtime/psr-nyholm`](https://github.com/php-runtime/psr-nyholm) how to run your application locally.

The following code is an example PSR-15 application with the Runtime component. If it works locally it will also with on AWS Lambda.

// public/index.php

use Nyholm\\Psr7\\Response;
use Psr\\Http\\Message\\ResponseInterface;
use Psr\\Http\\Message\\ServerRequestInterface;
use Psr\\Http\\Server\\RequestHandlerInterface;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function () {
 return new class implements RequestHandlerInterface {
 public function handle(ServerRequestInterface $request): ResponseInterface
 {
 $name = $request\->getQueryParams()\['name'\] ?? 'world';

 return new Response(200, \[\], "Hello $name");
 }
 };
};

Console application
-------------------

[](#console-application)

Use the standard Symfony 5.3+ `bin/console`.

// bin/console

use App\\Kernel;
use Symfony\\Bundle\\FrameworkBundle\\Console\\Application;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 $kernel = new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);

 return new Application($kernel);
};

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 console:
 handler: bin/console
 timeout: 120
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - schedule:
 rate: rate(30 minutes)
 input: '"app:invoice:send"'

PSR-11 Container
----------------

[](#psr-11-container)

The PSR-11 container is great. It really shines in internal microservices where you dont have to deal with HTTP or security. Your application just call your microservice using an AWS Lambda api client (ie `aws/aws-sdk-php` or `async-aws/lambda`). It is also great for reacting to S3 or SQS events.

The first thing we need is a file that returns a PSR-11 container. See below for an example for Symfony.

// bin/container.php

use App\\Kernel;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 $kernel = new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);
 $kernel\->boot();

 return $kernel\->getContainer();
};

Now we write a class/service that implements `Bref\Event\Handler`.

namespace App\\Lambda;

use Bref\\Context\\Context;
use Bref\\Event\\Handler;

class HelloWorld implements Handler
{
 public function handle($event, Context $context)
 {
 return 'Hello ' . $event\['name'\];
 }
}

Now we need to update serverless.yml to say "Use bin/container.php to get the container and then load service App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld".

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 hello:
 handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}

When this is deployed it can be invoked by

 serverless invoke --function hello --data '{"name":"Tobias"}'
 

Invoke handlers locally
-----------------------

[](#invoke-handlers-locally)

Using a service from the container makes the handlers very simple to unit test. However, if you are lazy, you may want to invoke them locally from CLI.

Run the following command to invoke the `App\Lambda\HelloWorld` service.

 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 

If your service expects some event data, add it as a JSON string or a path to a file containing JSON.

 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld '{"foo":"bar"}'
 
 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld example/input.json
 

### Simplify serverless.yml

[](#simplify-serverlessyml)

The syntax `handler: bin/container.php:App\Lambda\HelloWorld` might be a bit weird to write, but you may add an environment variable called `FALLBACK_CONTAINER_FILE` which includes the file to where we can get the PSR-11 container. This may help the serverless.yml file to read more natually.

 # serverless.yml

 provider:
 name: aws
 runtime: provided.al2
 # ...
 environment:
 APP\_ENV: prod
 APP\_RUNTIME: Runtime\\Bref\\Runtime
+ FALLBACK\_CONTAINER\_FILE: bin/container.php
 BREF\_LOOP\_MAX: 100 # Optional

 functions:
 hello:
\- handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
+ handler: App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}

Typed handlers
--------------

[](#typed-handlers)

To better integrate with different AWS events, one can use "typed handlers". These are classes that implements `Bref\Event\Handler` and provides some helper methods or classes.

To use them, you need to install Bref:

 composer req bref/bref
 

We use the same PSR-11 configuration from above and write custom handler like:

namespace App\\Lambda;

use Bref\\Context\\Context;
use Bref\\Event\\S3\\S3Event;
use Bref\\Event\\S3\\S3Handler;

class S3FileCreated extends S3Handler
{
 public function handleS3(S3Event $event, Context $context): void
 {
 $bucketName = $event\->getRecords()\[0\]->getBucket()->getName();
 $fileName = $event\->getRecords()\[0\]->getObject()->getKey();

 // do something with the file
 }
}

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 s3\_photos:
 handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\S3FileCreated
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - s3:
 bucket: photos
 event: s3:ObjectCreated:\*

Read more about different typed handlers at [Bref's documentation](https://bref.sh/docs/function/handlers.html).

### Symfony Messenger integration

[](#symfony-messenger-integration)

Similar to the typed handlers above, if you use [`bref/symfony-messenger`](https://github.com/brefphp/symfony-messenger) you may also want to define a worker function.

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 worker:
 handler: bin/container.php:Bref\\Symfony\\Messenger\\Service\\Sqs\\SqsConsumer
 timeout: 120
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - sqs:
 batchSize: 1 # Only 1 item at a time to simplify error handling
 arn: !GetAtt workqueue.Arn

resources:
 Resources:
 workqueue:
 Type: "AWS::SQS::Queue"
 Properties:
 QueueName: ${self:service}-workqueue
 VisibilityTimeout: 600

 45	 *
 46	 * @param App|object $app ThinkPHP应用实例
 47	 * @param array $config 配置数组
 48	 */
 49	 public function __construct($app, array $config = [])
 50	 {
 51	 $this->app = $app;
 52	 $this->config = $config;
 53	 $this->psr17Factory = new Psr17Factory();
 54	 }

 56	 /**
 57	 * 处理HTTP请求
 58	 *
 59	 * @param ServerRequestInterface $request PSR-7请求对象
 60	 * @return ResponseInterface PSR-7响应对象
 61	 */
 62	 public function handleRequest(ServerRequestInterface $request): ResponseInterface
 63	 {
 64	 try {
 65	 // 在常驻内存运行时中，需要在每次请求前重置全局状态
 66	 $this->resetGlobalState();
 67	
 68	 // 重置 ThinkPHP 应用状态
 69	 $this->resetThinkPHPState();
 70	
 71	 // 将PSR-7请求转换为ThinkPHP请求
 72	 $thinkRequest = $this->convertPsr7ToThinkRequest($request);
 73	
 74	 // 处理请求
 75	 $thinkResponse = $this->app->http->run($thinkRequest);
 76	
 77	 // 将ThinkPHP响应转换为PSR-7响应
 78	 return $this->convertThinkResponseToPsr7($thinkResponse);
 79	
 80	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
 81	 // 错误处理
 82	 return $this->handleError($e);
 83	 }
 84	 }

 449	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {

 455	 /**
 456	 * HTTP请求事件处理（改进版）
 457	 *
 458	 * @param SwooleRequest $request Swoole请求对象
 459	 * @param SwooleResponse $response Swoole响应对象
 460	 * @return void
 461	 */
 462	 public function onRequest(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): void
 463	 {
 464	 $startTime = microtime(true);
 465	
 466	 // 使用协程处理请求
 467	 go(function () use ($request, $response, $startTime) {
 468	 try {
 469	 // 设置协程上下文
 470	 $this->setCoroutineContext($request, $startTime);
 471	
 472	 // 运行中间件
 473	 if (!$this->runMiddlewares($request, $response)) {
 474	 return;
 475	 }
 476	
 477	 // 处理静态文件
 478	 if ($this->handleStaticFile($request, $response)) {
 479	 return;
 480	 }
 481	
 482	 // 处理动态请求
 483	 $psr7Request = $this->convertSwooleRequestToPsr7($request);
 484	 $psr7Response = $this->handleRequest($psr7Request);
 485	 $this->sendSwooleResponse($response, $psr7Response);
 486	
 487	 // 记录请求指标
 488	 $this->logRequestMetrics($request, $startTime);
 489	
 490	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
 491	 $this->handleSwooleError($response, $e);
 492	 } finally {
 493	 // 清理协程上下文
 494	 $this->clearCoroutineContext();
 495	 }
 496	 });
 497	 }

 596	 /**
 597	 * 将Swoole请求转换为PSR-7请求（优化版）
 598	 *
 599	 * @param SwooleRequest $request Swoole请求
 600	 * @return \Psr\Http\Message\ServerRequestInterface PSR-7请求
 601	 */
 602	 protected function convertSwooleRequestToPsr7(SwooleRequest $request): \Psr\Http\Message\ServerRequestInterface
 603	 {
 604	 // 使用复用的工厂实例
 605	 if (!$this->requestCreator) {
 606	 $this->requestCreator = new ServerRequestCreator(
 607	 $this->psr17Factory,
 608	 $this->psr17Factory,
 609	 $this->psr17Factory,
 610	 $this->psr17Factory
 611	 );
 612	 }
 613	
 614	 // 构建服务器变量
 615	 $server = array_merge($_SERVER, [
 616	 'REQUEST_METHOD' => $request->server['request_method'] ?? 'GET',
 617	 'REQUEST_URI' => $request->server['request_uri'] ?? '/',
 618	 'PATH_INFO' => $request->server['path_info'] ?? '/',
 619	 'QUERY_STRING' => $request->server['query_string'] ?? '',
 620	 'HTTP_HOST' => $request->header['host'] ?? 'localhost',
 621	 'CONTENT_TYPE' => $request->header['content-type'] ?? '',
 622	 'CONTENT_LENGTH' => $request->header['content-length'] ?? '',
 623	 ]);
 624	
 625	 return $this->requestCreator->fromArrays(
 626	 $server,
 627	 $request->header ?? [],
 628	 $request->cookie ?? [],
 629	 $request->get ?? [],
 630	 $request->post ?? [],
 631	 $request->files ?? [],
 632	 $request->rawContent() ?: null
 633	 );
 634	 }

 640	 * @param \Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface $psr7Response PSR-7响应对象
 641	 * @return void
 642	 */
 643	 protected function sendSwooleResponse(SwooleResponse $swooleResponse, \Psr\Http\Message\ResponseInterface $psr7Response): void
 644	 {
 645	 // 设置状态码
 646	 $swooleResponse->status($psr7Response->getStatusCode());
 647	
 648	 // 设置响应头
 649	 foreach ($psr7Response->getHeaders() as $name => $values) {
 650	 $swooleResponse->header((string) $name, implode(', ', $values));
 651	 }
 652	
 653	 // 发送响应体
 654	 $swooleResponse->end((string) $psr7Response->getBody());
 655	 }

 731	 */
 732	 protected function corsMiddleware(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): bool
 733	 {
 734	 $config = array_merge($this->defaultConfig, $this->config);
 735	 $corsConfig = $config['middleware']['cors'];
 736	
 737	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Origin', $corsConfig['allow_origin'] ?? '*');
 738	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Methods', $corsConfig['allow_methods'] ?? 'GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS');
 739	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Headers', $corsConfig['allow_headers'] ?? 'Content-Type, Authorization, X-Requested-With');
 740	 $response->header('Access-Control-Allow-Credentials', 'true');
 741	
 742	 // 处理 OPTIONS 预检请求
 743	 if ($request->server['request_method'] === 'OPTIONS') {
 744	 $response->status(200);
 745	 $response->end();
 746	 return false;
 747	 }
 748	
 749	 return true;

 768	 /**
 769	 * 处理静态文件
 770	 *
 771	 * @param SwooleRequest $request
 772	 * @param SwooleResponse $response
 773	 * @return bool
 774	 */
 775	 protected function handleStaticFile(SwooleRequest $request, SwooleResponse $response): bool
 776	 {
 777	 $config = array_merge($this->defaultConfig, $this->config);
 778	
 779	 if (!($config['static_file']['enable'] ?? true)) {
 780	 return false;
 781	 }
 782	
 783	 $uri = $request->server['request_uri'];
 784	 $publicPath = $this->getPublicPath();
 785	 $filePath = $publicPath . $uri;
 786	
 787	 // 检查文件是否存在且在允许的目录内
 788	 if (!$this->isValidStaticFile($filePath, $publicPath)) {
 789	 return false;
 790	 }
 791	
 792	 // 检查文件扩展名
 793	 $extension = strtolower(pathinfo($filePath, PATHINFO_EXTENSION));
 794	 if (!in_array($extension, $config['static_file']['allowed_extensions'])) {
 795	 return false;
 796	 }
 797	
 798	 // 设置 MIME 类型
 799	 $mimeType = $this->getMimeType($extension);
 800	 $response->header('Content-Type', $mimeType);
 801	
 802	 // 设置缓存头
 803	 $cacheTime = $config['static_file']['cache_time'];
 804	 $response->header('Cache-Control', "public, max-age={$cacheTime}");
 805	 $response->header('Last-Modified', gmdate('D, d M Y H:i:s', filemtime($filePath)) . ' GMT');
 806	
 807	 // 发送文件
 808	 $response->sendfile($filePath);
 809	 return true;
 810	 }

 820	 {

 822	 $realPublicPath = realpath($publicPath);
 823	
 824	 return $realFilePath &&
 825	 $realPublicPath &&
 826	 strpos($realFilePath, $realPublicPath) === 0 &&
 827	 is_file($realFilePath);

Bref Runtime
============

[](#bref-runtime)

Deploy an application with AWS Lambda using Bref.

We support all kinds of applications. See the following sections for details.

1. [Installation and usage](#installation)
2. [Symfony application](#symfony-application)
3. [Laravel application](#laravel-application)
4. [PSR-15 application](#psr-15-application)
5. [Console application](#console-application)
6. [PSR-11 container application](#psr-11-container)
 1. [Invoke handlers locally](#invoke-handlers-locally)
 2. [Simplify serverless.yml](#simplify-serverlessyml)
 3. [Typed handlers](#typed-handlers)
 4. [Symfony Messenger integration](#symfony-messenger-integration)

If you are new to the Symfony Runtime component, read more in the [main readme](https://github.com/php-runtime/runtime).

Installation
------------

[](#installation)

 composer require runtime/bref
 

To get started, we need a `serverless.yml` file in our projects root. We also use the `./vendor/runtime/bref-layer` plugin. Now we can tell AWS that we want to use a "layer" called `${runtime-bref:php-80}` to run our application on.

Next we need to define the environment variable `APP_RUNTIME` so the Runtime component knows what runtime to use.

# serverless.yml
service: my-app-name

plugins:
 - ./vendor/runtime/bref-layer # <----- Add the extra Serverless plugin

provider:
 name: aws
 region: eu-central-1
 runtime: provided.al2
 memorySize: 1792
 environment:
 APP\_ENV: prod
 APP\_RUNTIME: Runtime\\Bref\\Runtime
 BREF\_LOOP\_MAX: 100 # Optional

functions:
 website:
 handler: public/index.php
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 # Specify that we want HTTP requests
 - httpApi: '\*'

That is really it!

We use this file for all kinds of applications. The only thing we change in the `events`. Imagine that we want to listen to changes to S3 or new SQS messages. Or we could let this function to be invoked by another application in our system using a `Bref\Event\Handler`.

Symfony application
-------------------

[](#symfony-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

Use the standard Symfony 5.3+ `public/index.php`.

// public/index.php

use App\\Kernel;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 return new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);
};

There is nothing special you need to do.

Here is [an example application](https://github.com/Nyholm/bref-runtime-demo). With this runtime you may use the exact same application for in local development and in production.

Laravel application
-------------------

[](#laravel-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

To run a Laravel application, you need to update your front controller to look similar to this:

// public/index.php

use Illuminate\\Contracts\\Http\\Kernel;

define('LARAVEL\_START', microtime(true));

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (): Kernel {
 static $app;

 if (null === $app) {
 $app = require dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/bootstrap/app.php';
 }

 return $app\->make(Kernel::class);
};

Now you are up and running on AWS Lambda!

See [`runtime/laravel`](https://github.com/php-runtime/laravel) on how to run this locally.

PSR-15 application
------------------

[](#psr-15-application)

You need some extra features from Bref. Install it with

 composer req bref/bref
 

Bref is using [`nyholm/psr7`](https://github.com/nyholm/psr7) to provide a PSR-7 and PSR-15 experience. See [`runtime/psr-nyholm`](https://github.com/php-runtime/psr-nyholm) how to run your application locally.

The following code is an example PSR-15 application with the Runtime component. If it works locally it will also with on AWS Lambda.

// public/index.php

use Nyholm\\Psr7\\Response;
use Psr\\Http\\Message\\ResponseInterface;
use Psr\\Http\\Message\\ServerRequestInterface;
use Psr\\Http\\Server\\RequestHandlerInterface;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function () {
 return new class implements RequestHandlerInterface {
 public function handle(ServerRequestInterface $request): ResponseInterface
 {
 $name = $request\->getQueryParams()\['name'\] ?? 'world';

 return new Response(200, \[\], "Hello $name");
 }
 };
};

Console application
-------------------

[](#console-application)

Use the standard Symfony 5.3+ `bin/console`.

// bin/console

use App\\Kernel;
use Symfony\\Bundle\\FrameworkBundle\\Console\\Application;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 $kernel = new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);

 return new Application($kernel);
};

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 console:
 handler: bin/console
 timeout: 120
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - schedule:
 rate: rate(30 minutes)
 input: '"app:invoice:send"'

PSR-11 Container
----------------

[](#psr-11-container)

The PSR-11 container is great. It really shines in internal microservices where you dont have to deal with HTTP or security. Your application just call your microservice using an AWS Lambda api client (ie `aws/aws-sdk-php` or `async-aws/lambda`). It is also great for reacting to S3 or SQS events.

The first thing we need is a file that returns a PSR-11 container. See below for an example for Symfony.

// bin/container.php

use App\\Kernel;

require\_once dirname(\_\_DIR\_\_).'/vendor/autoload\_runtime.php';

return function (array $context) {
 $kernel = new Kernel($context\['APP\_ENV'\], (bool) $context\['APP\_DEBUG'\]);
 $kernel\->boot();

 return $kernel\->getContainer();
};

Now we write a class/service that implements `Bref\Event\Handler`.

namespace App\\Lambda;

use Bref\\Context\\Context;
use Bref\\Event\\Handler;

class HelloWorld implements Handler
{
 public function handle($event, Context $context)
 {
 return 'Hello ' . $event\['name'\];
 }
}

Now we need to update serverless.yml to say "Use bin/container.php to get the container and then load service App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld".

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 hello:
 handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}

When this is deployed it can be invoked by

 serverless invoke --function hello --data '{"name":"Tobias"}'
 

Invoke handlers locally
-----------------------

[](#invoke-handlers-locally)

Using a service from the container makes the handlers very simple to unit test. However, if you are lazy, you may want to invoke them locally from CLI.

Run the following command to invoke the `App\Lambda\HelloWorld` service.

 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 

If your service expects some event data, add it as a JSON string or a path to a file containing JSON.

 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld '{"foo":"bar"}'
 
 ./vendor/bin/bref-local-handler.php ./bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld example/input.json
 

### Simplify serverless.yml

[](#simplify-serverlessyml)

The syntax `handler: bin/container.php:App\Lambda\HelloWorld` might be a bit weird to write, but you may add an environment variable called `FALLBACK_CONTAINER_FILE` which includes the file to where we can get the PSR-11 container. This may help the serverless.yml file to read more natually.

 # serverless.yml

 provider:
 name: aws
 runtime: provided.al2
 # ...
 environment:
 APP\_ENV: prod
 APP\_RUNTIME: Runtime\\Bref\\Runtime
+ FALLBACK\_CONTAINER\_FILE: bin/container.php
 BREF\_LOOP\_MAX: 100 # Optional

 functions:
 hello:
\- handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
+ handler: App\\Lambda\\HelloWorld
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}

Typed handlers
--------------

[](#typed-handlers)

To better integrate with different AWS events, one can use "typed handlers". These are classes that implements `Bref\Event\Handler` and provides some helper methods or classes.

To use them, you need to install Bref:

 composer req bref/bref
 

We use the same PSR-11 configuration from above and write custom handler like:

namespace App\\Lambda;

use Bref\\Context\\Context;
use Bref\\Event\\S3\\S3Event;
use Bref\\Event\\S3\\S3Handler;

class S3FileCreated extends S3Handler
{
 public function handleS3(S3Event $event, Context $context): void
 {
 $bucketName = $event\->getRecords()\[0\]->getBucket()->getName();
 $fileName = $event\->getRecords()\[0\]->getObject()->getKey();

 // do something with the file
 }
}

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 s3\_photos:
 handler: bin/container.php:App\\Lambda\\S3FileCreated
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - s3:
 bucket: photos
 event: s3:ObjectCreated:\*

Read more about different typed handlers at [Bref's documentation](https://bref.sh/docs/function/handlers.html).

### Symfony Messenger integration

[](#symfony-messenger-integration)

Similar to the typed handlers above, if you use [`bref/symfony-messenger`](https://github.com/brefphp/symfony-messenger) you may also want to define a worker function.

# serverless.yml

# ...

functions:
 worker:
 handler: bin/container.php:Bref\\Symfony\\Messenger\\Service\\Sqs\\SqsConsumer
 timeout: 120
 layers:
 - ${runtime-bref:php-80}
 events:
 - sqs:
 batchSize: 1 # Only 1 item at a time to simplify error handling
 arn: !GetAtt workqueue.Arn

resources:
 Resources:
 workqueue:
 Type: "AWS::SQS::Queue"
 Properties:
 QueueName: ${self:service}-workqueue
 VisibilityTimeout: 600

 140	 /**
 141	 * 将PSR-7请求转换为ThinkPHP请求
 142	 *
 143	 * @param ServerRequestInterface $request PSR-7请求
 144	 * @return Request ThinkPHP请求
 145	 */
 146	 protected function convertPsr7ToThinkRequest(ServerRequestInterface $request): Request
 147	 {
 148	 $server = [];
 149	 $headers = [];
 150	
 151	 // 转换请求头
 152	 foreach ($request->getHeaders() as $name => $values) {
 153	 $headerName = (string) $name;
 154	 $headers[$headerName] = implode(', ', $values);
 155	 $server['HTTP_' . strtoupper(str_replace('-', '_', $headerName))] = $headers[$headerName];
 156	 }
 157	
 158	 // 设置基本服务器变量
 159	 $server['REQUEST_METHOD'] = $request->getMethod();
 160	 $server['REQUEST_URI'] = (string) $request->getUri();
 161	 $server['SERVER_PROTOCOL'] = 'HTTP/' . $request->getProtocolVersion();
 162	 $server['QUERY_STRING'] = $request->getUri()->getQuery();
 163	
 164	 // 创建ThinkPHP请求
 165	 // 注意：这里需要根据实际的ThinkPHP版本调整Request创建方式
 166	 $thinkRequest = $this->app->request;
 167	
 168	 // 如果没有现有请求，创建新的
 169	 if (!$thinkRequest) {
 170	 $thinkRequest = new Request();
 171	 }
 172	
 173	 // 设置服务器变量
 174	 foreach ($server as $key => $value) {
 175	 $_SERVER[$key] = $value;
 176	 }
 177	
 178	 // 设置请求头
 179	 foreach ($headers as $name => $value) {
 180	 $_SERVER['HTTP_' . strtoupper(str_replace('-', '_', $name))] = $value;
 181	 }
 182	
 183	 // 设置POST数据
 184	 $parsedBody = $request->getParsedBody();
 185	 if (is_array($parsedBody)) {
 186	 $_POST = $parsedBody;
 187	 }
 188	
 189	 // 设置GET数据
 190	 parse_str($request->getUri()->getQuery(), $queryParams);
 191	 $_GET = $queryParams;
 192	
 193	 // 设置请求体
 194	 $body = (string) $request->getBody();
 195	 if (!empty($body)) {
 196	 // 对于JSON请求，可能需要特殊处理
 197	 if (strpos($headers['content-type'] ?? '', 'application/json') !== false) {
 198	 $jsonData = json_decode($body, true);
 199	 if (is_array($jsonData)) {
 200	 $_POST = array_merge($_POST, $jsonData);
 201	 }
 202	 }
 203	 }
 204	
 205	 return $thinkRequest;
 206	 }

 213	 */
 214	 protected function convertThinkResponseToPsr7(Response $response): ResponseInterface
 215	 {

 75	 $thinkResponse = $this->app->http->run($thinkRequest);
 76

 78	 return $this->convertThinkResponseToPsr7($thinkResponse);
 79	
 80	 } catch (\Throwable $e) {
